com.azure.storage.file

Class DirectoryClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.storage.file.DirectoryClientBuilder

  • public class DirectoryClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a fluent builder API to help aid the configuration and instantiation of the FileClients and FileAsyncClients, calling buildClient constructs an instance of FileClient and calling buildAsyncClient constructs an instance of FileAsyncClient.

    The client needs the endpoint of the Azure Storage File service, name of the share, and authorization credential. endpoint gives the builder the endpoint and may give the builder the DirectoryClientBuilder.shareName(String), DirectoryClientBuilder.directoryPath(String) and a SASTokenCredential that authorizes the client.

    Instantiating a synchronous Directory Client with SAS token

    Snippet 'com.azure.storage.file.directoryClient.instantiation.sastoken' not found.

    Instantiating an Asynchronous Directory Client with SAS token

    Snippet 'com.azure.storage.file.directoryClient.instantiation.sastoken' not found.

    If the endpoint doesn't contain the query parameters to construct a SASTokenCredential they may be set using credential.

    Snippet 'com.azure.storage.file.directoryClient.instantiation.credential' not found.
    Snippet 'com.azure.storage.file.directoryAsyncClient.instantiation.credential' not found.

    Another way to authenticate the client is using a SharedKeyCredential. To create a SharedKeyCredential a connection string from the Storage File service must be used. Set the SharedKeyCredential with connectionString. If the builder has both a SASTokenCredential and SharedKeyCredential the SharedKeyCredential will be preferred when authorizing requests sent to the service.

    Instantiating a synchronous Directory Client with connection string.

    Snippet 'com.azure.storage.file.directoryClient.instantiation.connectionstring' not found.

    Instantiating an Asynchronous Directory Client with connection string.

    Snippet 'com.azure.storage.file.directoryAsyncClient.instantiation.connectionstring' not found.
    See Also:
    DirectoryClient, DirectoryAsyncClient, SASTokenCredential, SharedKeyCredential

      DirectoryClientBuilder()
      Creates a builder instance that is able to configure and construct DirectoryClients and DirectoryAsyncClients.

      Sets the configuration object used to retrieve environment configuration values used to buildClient the client with when they are not set in the builder, defaults to Configuration.NONE

      Creates a SharedKeyCredential from the connectionString used to authenticate requests sent to the File service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectoryClientBuilder

        public DirectoryClientBuilder()
        Creates a builder instance that is able to configure and construct DirectoryClients and DirectoryAsyncClients.

    • Method Detail

      • buildAsyncClient

        public DirectoryAsyncClient buildAsyncClient()
        Creates a DirectoryAsyncClient based on options set in the builder. Every time buildAsyncClient() is called a new instance of DirectoryAsyncClient is created.

        If pipeline is set, then the pipeline and endpoint are used to create the client. All other builder settings are ignored.

        Returns:
        A ShareAsyncClient with the options set from the builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If shareName is null or shareName is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If neither a SharedKeyCredential or SASTokenCredential has been set.

      • buildClient

        public DirectoryClient buildClient()
        Creates a DirectoryClient based on options set in the builder. Every time buildClient() is called a new instance of DirectoryClient is created.

        If pipeline is set, then the pipeline and endpoint are used to create the client. All other builder settings are ignored.

        Returns:
        A DirectoryClient with the options set from the builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If endpoint, shareName or directoryPath is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If neither a SharedKeyCredential or SASTokenCredential has been set.

      • endpoint

        public DirectoryClientBuilder endpoint(java.lang.String endpoint)
        Sets the endpoint for the Azure Storage File instance that the client will interact with.

        The first path segment, if the endpoint contains path segments, will be assumed to be the name of the share that the client will interact with. Rest of the path segments should be the path of the directory.

        Query parameters of the endpoint will be parsed using SASTokenCredential#fromQuery(String) in an attempt to generate a SASTokenCredential to authenticate requests sent to the service.

        Parameters:
        endpoint - The URL of the Azure Storage File instance to send service requests to and receive responses from.
        Returns:
        the updated DirectoryClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If endpoint is null or is an invalid URL

      • credential

        public DirectoryClientBuilder credential(SASTokenCredential credential)
        Sets the SASTokenCredential used to authenticate requests sent to the File service.
        Parameters:
        credential - SAS token credential generated from the Storage account that authorizes requests
        Returns:
        the updated DirectoryClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If credential is null.

      • credential

        public DirectoryClientBuilder credential(SharedKeyCredential credential)
        Sets the SharedKeyCredential used to authenticate requests sent to the File service.
        Parameters:
        credential - Shared key credential generated from the Storage account that authorizes requests
        Returns:
        the updated ShareClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If credential is null.

      • connectionString

        public DirectoryClientBuilder connectionString(java.lang.String connectionString)
        Creates a SharedKeyCredential from the connectionString used to authenticate requests sent to the File service.
        Parameters:
        connectionString - Connection string from the Access Keys section in the Storage account
        Returns:
        the updated DirectoryClientBuilder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If connectionString is null.

        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If shareName is null.

        Returns:
        The updated DirectoryClientBuilder object.

        public DirectoryClientBuilder httpLogDetailLevel(HttpLogDetailLevel logLevel)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The updated DirectoryClientBuilder object.

      • pipeline

        public DirectoryClientBuilder pipeline(HttpPipeline pipeline)
        Sets the HTTP pipeline to use for the service client.

        If pipeline is set, all other settings are ignored, aside from endpoint, shareName @{link DirectoryClientBuilder#directoryPath(String) filePath}, and snaphotShot when building clients.

        Parameters:
        pipeline - The HTTP pipeline to use for sending service requests and receiving responses.
        Returns:
        The updated DirectoryClientBuilder object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If pipeline is null.

      • configuration

        public DirectoryClientBuilder configuration(Configuration configuration)
        Sets the configuration object used to retrieve environment configuration values used to buildClient the client with when they are not set in the builder, defaults to Configuration.NONE
        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration store
        Returns:
        the updated DirectoryClientBuilder object

      • snapshot

        public DirectoryClientBuilder snapshot(java.lang.String snapshot)
        Sets the share snapshot that the constructed clients will interact with. This snapshot must be linked to the share that has been specified in the builder.
        Parameters:
        snapshot - Identifier of the share snapshot
        Returns:
        the updated DirectoryClientBuilder object.
